sourceMeaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>tree</radical> and another <radical>tree</radical>. You basically have yourself a <kanji>forest</kanji>!
meaningInfo: Follow the logic of this one and you should be okay.
readingMnemonic: So, now you have this <kanji>forest</kanji> and you want to cut it down (so much money!). But, you don't have any tools, only your hands. You think... I've done karate for a while, so I can probably chop it down that way. You get in a chopping stance, then do your battle cry and hit: "<reading>HAYA ... .SHI******</reading>!"
readingInfo: Obviously that didn't work well - you'll want to focus on your battle cry plus indecent swearing right afterwards to remember this reading.
